title: Deals: Google Nest Hub 2 hits 2022 low of $55, Galaxy Buds Pro $150, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by the Google Nest Hub 2 hitting $55. Plus, save on the Galaxy Buds Pro in all four styles at $150 and Samsung’s UWB item finder for $34. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Google Nest Hub 2 hits 2022 low of $55, Galaxy Buds Pro $150, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The new Google Nest Hub 2 has dropped to the best price of 2022 following a discount to $55 alongside Galaxy Buds Pro and more.
